author: SkinnyTaste
name: Arugula Pasta Salad with Chickpeas and Sun Dried Tomatoes
instructions: Boil pasta in a large pot of salted water according to package directions for al dente. Drain and run under cold water to stop the cooking. Toss the pasta with baby arugula, sun dried tomatoes, chick peas, oil, vinegar, half of the cheese, salt and fresh cracked pepper to taste. Divide between 4 plates and top with remaining shaved Parmesan cheese.
